mapper.select: SELECT r.idx, r.diction_idx, r.myid, r.message, r.writeday, d.subject AS diction_subject FROM dictionary_reple r, dictionary d WHERE r.diction_idx = d.idx and r.myid = #{myid} order by r.writeday DESC;
mapper.insert: insert into dictionary_reple (diction_idx, myid, message, photo, writeday) values (#{diction_idx}, #{myid}, #{message}, #{photo}, now());
mapper.select: select * from dictionary_reple where diction_idx=#{diction_idx} order by num desc
select photo from dictionary_reple where num=#{num}
mapper.update: update dictionary_reple set message=#{message} where num=#{num}
